body_html:
@peterjc123
I got the following errors with your commands included.
Commands used (x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2017 and CUDA 9):

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
mkdir torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
cd torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
mkdir ATen
python ../../../../../../aten/src/aten/gen.py -s ../../../../../../aten/src/aten ..
cd ../../../../../..
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
activate test
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
python setup.py install

Errors:

"C:\Users\Alex\source\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Alex\source\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->

body_text:
@peterjc123
I got the following errors with your commands included.
Commands used (x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2017 and CUDA 9):
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
mkdir torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
cd torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
mkdir ATen
python ../../../../../../aten/src/aten/gen.py -s ../../../../../../aten/src/aten ..
cd ../../../../../..
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
activate test
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
python setup.py install

body:
@peterjc123 
I got the following errors with your commands included.
Commands used (x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2017 and CUDA 9):
```
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
mkdir torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
cd torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
mkdir ATen
python ../../../../../../aten/src/aten/gen.py -s ../../../../../../aten/src/aten ..
cd ../../../../../..
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
activate test
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
python setup.py install
```

Errors:

